name: places/ChIJP3l6e55ZwokRT0WZ3fPz9Wk
adrFormatAddress: 200 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10003-5707, USA

originalText.text: this place is great! the woman (perhaps owner) there is always sweet and caring. prices are good and they do a better job dry cleaning than most places in the hood. thanks!!!

text.text: this place is great! the woman (perhaps owner) there is always sweet and caring. prices are good and they do a better job dry cleaning than most places in the hood. thanks!!!

originalText.text: They thoroughly got out all the stains from my dirty down jacket. It’s made from recycled water bottles so I was worried that it would melt and come out clumpy but it the owner reassured me that it’s not a problem. 5 days later I came to pick it up and it was like new, which was shocking because my jacket is extremely baby blue. I highly recommend them!!

originalText.text:
Don't go here for alterations.
Went in asked for pants to be taken in the woman on duty kept telling me my request isn't the fashion the fashion is big and go home think about it. I insisted it's what I want show her but she then shakes her head said it would be too expensive over $30 so she told me it wasn't worth doing! I ended up walking down to 12th st found a great dry cleaners who were eager for the job for $20.

originalText.text: Staff is friendly and kind. I’ve been here several times for dry cleaning and wash and fold and I’m always very happy with how the clothes turn out. Their prices can’t be beat either.

text.text: Staff is friendly and kind. I’ve been here several times for dry cleaning and wash and fold and I’m always very happy with how the clothes turn out. Their prices can’t be beat either.

originalText.text: I would highly recommend Quality Plus Dry. I have been using the business for about 2 years now. Being new to the city and not having a washer or dryer in my building, I did a quick google search and it was one of the first ones that popped up. They do a free pick/delivery option which is great. The man who picks up with the laundry is incredibly friendly. After building a relationship, I have been able to text him a pick up/delivery time window before and after work. He comes on time and will call to make sure you are home. A typical TAT would be 8AM pickup and 6PM drop off with clean and folded clothes. The clothes are always incredibly clean and folded ready for use. The price is VERY reasonable and I have even gotten my roommate to start using them as their price is cheaper than their competitors in the area. I am INCREDIBLY grateful for this laundromat for being so accessible, friendly, responsive, and reliable. I would not recommend any other laundromat.
